website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable and extremely private cat bed for shy pets or brand new kitties who are still skittish.
pros: Igloo design provides plenty of coverage and privacy, with an adequate-sized opening
Extra plush cushion is removable for ease of cleaning
cons: Bed interior is on the small side, especially with the plush cushion

customer_reviews.title: Have 2 cats (and bought 2 beds) and they both love this house/bed.
customer_reviews.text: Inherited a cat who only wanted to sleep in her carrier (she had a lot of adjustments to make when coming to us). I wanted something that she would feel safe in yet was softer/nicer than the little carrier. Only change I made was to take all of the stuffing out of the "pillow" that came with the bed - it filled up the house so much. Now she has a nice soft fabric to sleep on and she loves it. We have another cat that likes to "hide" when she sleeps and she also loves this house/bed.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: One of the best kitty bed
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it! My cat never used any bed before this one so I am not so sure when I first trying to purchase it. But it only took him 30 minutes to get on the cozy bed and sleep in there. The materials are super soft and I believe that is the main reason my cat likes it. The size is perfect as it is not too big or too small for any cats and small pups I guess. I have not yet clean it but it seems relatively easy to clean. This is one of the best purchase I have made recently.
customer_reviews.author: JZ. LI

customer_reviews.title: Nonremovable pillow case
customer_reviews.text: I am fostering kittens and they absolutely love this little tent and so did I, until I removed the soft pillow from inside and realized that it’s not a removable case. Maybe this wouldn’t be as big of a deal for an adult cat but kittens are pretty messy. They actually suckle on this pillow as they would if they were nursing on their mom so it all pilled up from the wetness and there’s litter, food etc stuck in it. I have no way to properly clean it. I hoped to use this for many years to come but it’s a real shame that they did not make the pillow cover removable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Chomicki

customer_reviews.title: The cat gives 5+ stars
customer_reviews.text: This looks and is exactly as described and is quite nice. My cat usually sleeps out on the patio, but in the Winter hesitantly comes in at night. I wasn't sure if my 5 y.o. 6lb cat would like it since she has never had a covered bed before. The first few days she explored the outside and stuck her head in time or few. Then one night I peered out and she was happily tucked in, deep in sleep. It is a hit. I will say the size recommended for her size is a bit small, but she is not complaining.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: made well
customer_reviews.text: this is a very well made nice product. Too small for my really big cat.
customer_reviews.author: joejoe

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed....for a Small Cat
customer_reviews.text: I loved the design of this bed, and the pillow inside is as soft as a cloud...but.....my cat is about 13 pounds and there's no way he could fit inside this bed. Maybe if the opening was a big larger and square instead of like a triangle, he would have tried going in. One review said a 14 pound cat would fit comfortably, I beg to differ. But it's a well-made bed for a smaller cat. Hated to do it, but had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: My neighbors cat has claimed us since we moved in years ago. She sleeps in our garage a night. I worry about her when it gets cold so I bought one for her and she took to it right away! Now I think I’ve created a lazy cat! Love her!!
customer_reviews.author: runner34

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is currently at my parents house spending time with them so I will update Th is as soon as I get him but from my personal feelings it is sturdy enough and soft. I love how small and compact yet big it is for my Chihuahua Update My chihuahua loves his tent so much and it is really durable the only minor complaint that I have is that the pillow is white and is easier to get dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Hoeplebo

customer_reviews.title: Cute kitty bed
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my friend because she got a kitty! It’s soft as expected, but smaller than what I expected. My friend loves the bed because the look. I would recommend my friend to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: jennag

customer_reviews.title: Cozy dark soft cave-like bed, it’s perfect
customer_reviews.text: Kitten took to the bed immediately! Cozy dark and soft. We call it the cave bed, it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: K. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is not right in ad
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today and the listing states that the item is 15x15x15 when in actuality it is only 14x14x15 which is exactly what it states on the box. How do you miss that inless you're trying to misrepresent an item, I had seen another one of these on Amazon and was going to buy it but it didn't have the cushion and it 16x16x15, it was cheaper and I thought well this one is close and it has the cushion the larger one did not. So if you have a large cat as my 2 males are they probably wouldn't like it, however I have a smaller female and I'm hoping she does.
customer_reviews.author: Julie  S.

customer_reviews.title: Approved by picky cat!
customer_reviews.text: My cat isn’t found a new beds and he’s never had a “covered” bed, however he loves to hide away when we travel or there’s a storm. He surprisingly ran to this bed once I set it up! He’s continued to become comfortable with it, use it while we’re away and we are thankful for the ease of cleaning, the fact it didn’t smell off-putting when we received it (which has occurred with a lot of recent Amazon orders) and that is seems to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My five year old cat loves "hidey" places. As soon as I put this together he was in it. I group his bed, toys, and now this tent under a light blanket tent (attached to the sofa on one end) and he loves to lay/hide in there and look out the slider at the birds and squirrels. That's where he was when I left for work this morning. The tent pillow is fluffy and soft, and the tent itself feels soft and once the cushion is in place, it is very sturdy. My cat is about 9 lbs., and he fits comfortably curled up. I'm glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Cat approved
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter's cat who lives outside. He lives on her covered porch because he refuses to use his litter box and their home is situated in as safe an area as possible for an outdoor pet. He loves this bed and lays in it even when he's not sleeping. He prefers his memory foam mattress to the cushions on her deck furniture. He likes to lay on his back with his head sticking out so he can see everything that happens in her backyard. She puts it in the washing machine and it holds its shape and cleans up nicely. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sims

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves this cave
customer_reviews.text: The cat really likes this bed. She has six beds, and it ranks at #2. And she goes into the bed right before I go to bed at night because she knows I won't be able to lift her out. Crafty little kitty, she is! The pillow is fluffy and very soft. The dimensions are not huge, so she can't stretch out, but she has four other beds that are very large, so she has some diversity that way. It appears very well made and I have it on my desk next to my computer so she can supervise my work quality whilst in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Alot2do

customer_reviews.title: Beads falling off the bottom
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tent for my 13lb cat. It sits on my bed. On occasion he will sleep in it. The bottom has tiny little rubber beads (meant to keep the tent secured if sitting on a wood or linoleum floor). Even though the tent is largely undisturbed (and has never been washed) I have noticed that the little beads are falling off. I've only had it for a very short period of time. A plus is that the sherpa looking pillow comes out of the tent, however, given the beads falling off Im not sure that I would attempt washing it. It's an "ok"-product. But nothing to write home about.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my cat but great for kittens and smaller cats
customer_reviews.text: Cat had kittens and they love it even though the bigger ones don't. My cat I bought it for wanted nothing to do with it, I think it's because it's a bit on the small side for a full grown cat and she doesn't like anything covering the top of a bed. Kittens love it so if you have a smaller cat this will be perfect for you. The cushion it comes with is machine washable and the rest you can spot wash so the bottom (mesh type material) doesn't ruin. It's collapsible as well and you simply pop it up, put the pillow inside and it's good to go.
customer_reviews.author: BlackMoon95

customer_reviews.title: Great Hideaway
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my neighbor's kitty that was living in the cold garage. This was an instant hit! Sweetie was in it in no time and it was very clear it was her favorite place to cuddle and stay warm. I loved the thickness of the walls. The cushion was very thick and made of warm material that is easily machine washed. I highly recommend this ... even for your inside kitties that like their own space!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Rhode

customer_reviews.title: My Cat LIves in This Cave Bed
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned that my cat might not be interested in this bed, but it's become her daytime home. She loves the softness of the inner lining; I see her kneading it with her front paws. It keeps the draft from the ceiling fan off her, which is important because she has long hair that gets matted and I have her shaved periodically. The cave bed stands up on its own (i.e., the shelter part is nice and firm.) Couldn't have asked for more.
customer_reviews.author: MoneyMom

customer_reviews.title: Great, cozy kitty cave
customer_reviews.text: My kitty absolutely loves to hide and sleep in this kitty cave. The bottom of the cave is a different sheer type material than the rest of the house, but it’s been a great cozy place for her.
customer_reviews.author: pamela m engle

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sight!
customer_reviews.text: Our tabby went straight to it and slept for nearly three hours, came out to eat a bite, and went right back into it -- and slept there all night! It's her new favorite spot. It's well made, a pretty color, and looks nice. We'll probably purchase another for a different room. Maggie says 👍.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Bovender

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, but kitty is having none of it so far!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cat to sleep in out on our screened porch. It’s very nice quality, however, he’s still skeptical of the cat cave, and has yet to get in it...like not even to look around. Maybe he thinks a stud like him doesn’t need a cat cave....I dunno. However, he did finally give in to sleeping on the electric heating pad I got for him from Amazon...and gas told me he loves it, but it took a while for him to even try it out. Maybe, in time, he’ll try the cat cave, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kittens loves this tent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent for my two kittens and they love it. It's small enough for 2 small kittens or a medium size cat. The pillow is so soft and removable you can easily clean it. I love this tent for my kittens they love it, and I highly recommend this tent.
customer_reviews.author: AA20400

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I have an 18 yo grumpy old man kitty that is very particular about where he sleeps, but he immediately went into this little bed/house and sleeps in there every night since. It is pretty warm and my cat seems comfortable. Even my 15 lb cat fits in there.
customer_reviews.author: Rocio

customer_reviews.title: Strange Texture
customer_reviews.text: The inside pillow seems unfinished, like stuffing for a pillow, and the shell has either been exposed to a pet and returned or has some odor from manufacturing that my cats hate. They won't sleep in it, instead, they try to tear the texture apart. They don't do this with the boiled wool cat cave. I've had to give it away, am afraid they'd pull off a piece and swallow it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My girl loves this bed. She spends most of her time in it kneading and purring. My cat weighs about 10lbs. She fits comfortably and was able to stretch horizontally. It can be folded to a bed but my girl prefers to stay in the tent. The tent is easy to be cleaned as well. It can be folded to a bed but my girl prefers to stay in the tent.
customer_reviews.author: doris

customer_reviews.title: Nice little bed
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected, but nice bed. To small for the cat but right size for our Chihuahua.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Forever

customer_reviews.title: Our cat loves his cat-cave!
customer_reviews.text: We recently moved to a house without an insulated garage. Our garage cat was suddenly in an environment that used to be 40-50 degrees, and now got down to 10-20. We needed something for him that would keep him nice and cozy during the winter months. Enter this cave bed. He loves it. When we walk through the garage, he'll poke his head out to watch us, but then will go back in to curl up. We've tried numerous beds in the past, and they are usually shunned. Not this one. Overall, very soft, very sturdy. Keeps our cat warm and toasty, even with temperatures in the teens.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Much sturdier than the soft-sided ones
customer_reviews.text: This tent cave bed is much sturdier than the two soft-sided ones that I purchased. My two kittens just seem to enjoy jumping on and collapsing the soft-sided ones, but not using them. I put a little catnip inside them to entice the kittens to use them, but to be honest they have so many options where to hide and sleep around my condo they don't use them much.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My cat doesn't take to new things quickly, so it took about a week or so for her to get used to it, but she loves it because it's dark and warm and the pillow inside is soooo soft. Definitely recommend if you have a cat that likes to hide.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C.

customer_reviews.title: Small dogs and cats both seem to love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10lb yorkie...but the moment I put it out our 2 cats had to investigate and now I have a feeling we'll be ordering 2 more of these. For the price? Great buy. The door is large and overall its very soft and seems like it'll be warm for wintersince our dogs fenced in yard are of the house is connected to a dog door that leads outside. It gets breezy due to the dog door so I wanted to make sure the pup had a cozy spot to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Heather

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it! The mat material is soft enough and can be washed separately. Easy to disassemble and clean is very important for a pet bed and this product did it!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Good quality construction and materials
customer_reviews.text: We are using this for a local feral cat who has not “found” it yet. I was particularly amazed at it’s soft pillow insert. I have another similar “house” to this one and it machine washes beautifully. Soft but very sturdy and stands up nicely without collapsing—good quality construction and materials.
customer_reviews.author: G. Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: perfect bed for any cat
customer_reviews.text: I bough this for my 5 week old kitten and he loves it. The most precious part of walking into my room is seeing him sleepily walk out of this bed. I was worried it would be a flimsy material because you never know, but it stays up just like in the pictures. It’s super soft and cuddly, given that my kitty always snuggles up in the back corner of it.
customer_reviews.author: what kind of a name is this?

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a yorkie
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 4kb yorkie. It’s cozy and she loves it. Looks cute , fits in the corner of any room. Front doesn’t zip or close so it’s not a crate. It’s perfect for when she’s feeling in need of a safe space on her own.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Spero

customer_reviews.title: Our former feral cat spends most of her time in her new home
customer_reviews.text: The cat cave is attractive yet sturdy. The cushion is "ultra soft "! Our cat is spending a large part of his day in the bed (whose opening faces the window), watching the world go by. What is most important is : he loves the Tent Cave Bed ! He has baskets to lounge in , plus other cozy places , but this is his home !
customer_reviews.author: June McCann

customer_reviews.title: soft. kittens sit on top.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a couple new kittens to help them feel secure. one went inside for a day or two then they preferred to sleep on top of it. the whole thing is soft and warm looking and you can wash the inside removable pad. I will probably trash the outside part when it gets too dirty. I would try to wash it if the kitts would sleep inside. It seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: tent cave bed for cats/small dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Cave bed arrived about 11:00. Unpacked it. Inserted pad. Small 5 pound Chihuahua climbed in immediately, curled up and went to sleep. He has been in the bed 9 hours coming out to pee in yard and eat (15 minutes) and returned to Cave bed. It is gray in color. Sturdy. Dog gives it 4 paws up.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Nana

customer_reviews.title: Too Small For grown Cats
customer_reviews.text: Cats did not like it or even go in. Opening is too small for grown cats. Cats like circle openings not the triangle shape of this one. Even when folded down into a bed with pillow too small and cats still would not use it. Looked great so I was disappointed with this product unfortunately. Other reviews were correct too small.
customer_reviews.author: Wildroses

customer_reviews.title: Goes with my decor and my Poppy loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat loves this cave. She did NOT like the pillow that came with it. We did put the 22” Amazon Basics Pet Bolster bed inside. It kind of folds up the back. She prefers it. We just took it out of her pet crate and placed it in and she loves it. I also like that it matches my decor, rather than this cheesy fabrics with cats on them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Langston

customer_reviews.title: SO COMFY
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my cat which he/she loved (long story) but then after awhile he/she never went back in. Could be cuz some kind of essential oil got in there somehow. Any way, my dog ended taking over. I put it downstairs where he sleeps and he went INside of it and then i found him laying on top of it. He looked COMFY so i let it BE! Overall, they love(d) it and would definitely reccommend it. I like the quality of the material and aesthetically pleased with it as well. Great job on creating this product. Hope the people who are sewing/putting this together is BEING PAID PROPERLY!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie L

customer_reviews.title: My cat too big but well made product
customer_reviews.text: Floki is like "no". He's too big I think. 14lbs and large boned. I pulled the cushion out and he went in once for a minute and that is it. Even though the house is 50f and he's a Thai cat. He likes bikes too. This one I think just too small. I also tried in bed mode and had no luck. Too small. They need a jumbo size. I will update if he starts to use it. Beyond that, the cushion is super plush and the sides don't seem cheap at all.
customer_reviews.author: damian

customer_reviews.title: Good choice.
customer_reviews.text: The cats gravitated right towards it. Perfect size...15 x 15. You can also add extra insert(s) like fabric to intensify inside for warmth. 😺
customer_reviews.author: charlette wilson himsel

customer_reviews.title: Pancake Approved
customer_reviews.text: Cute little cat bed! Super soft. It’s a little small for Pancake, my 15 lb Maine Coon but he still loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat approved
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for the rabbit, but the cat loved it so much that she got it. She jumped inside and it has been her "spot" since it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small for a fully grown cat
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute bed. I wanted to love it. It is soft and cozy, but my cat won’t even look at it. It is just too small for him. He is not a huge cat, just an average sized short hair cat. I think he would use it if it was 2 inches wider on every side. 😕
customer_reviews.author: D. Liggett

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality just a bit small for my kitty
customer_reviews.text: It was a great product just a bit too small for my cat. He's got a long slender body so this was too small for him. I ended up returning the hut but no because of any quality issues only due to the size. Has a nice fluffy pillow inside as well. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Christina L

customer_reviews.title: A MUST FOR YOUR DUR BABY
customer_reviews.text: My cat just loves it but didn’t care the pad. I ended up putting a thick pillow case instead. I washed both the bed and pad in cold water and tumble dry low. All good.
customer_reviews.author: GIMI

customer_reviews.title: Warm Cuddle Spot Award!
customer_reviews.text: This is my cat’s desktop home. While i work all day, she curls up in her tent. I love the quality of this item! The removable bed is soft and warm. I set this on the desk, the first night, the first moments and my girly was hooked. Great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Pitts

customer_reviews.title: This bed is #1 choice - kitty approved!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three very different cat beds for my furry friends to consider. This is definitely the number one choice. It is very cute with just enough room for one (not too big!) kitty. I think I will need to purchase another one just like it!
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Green

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: My kitten is super tiny and barely weighs about 4 pounds but is still too small to go into the hole to the bed. She sniffs the inside and never goes in, despite all my efforts. The fluffy pillow takes up most of the space inside the bed so it makes it even smaller. They say its recommended for cats and small dogs but really it should be kittens and extremely small cats.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Chihuahua!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 4lb chihuahua! She loves it! Exactly what I was looking for. Similar "cat" beds have wire inside to maintain the shape and I'm so pleased this one doesn't because my pup used to chew until the wire came out. This is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Zen316

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: Cat loves going both inside and sleeping on top of it. It kind of folds into a cat bed if it’s pushed down. Looks stylish and it’s high quality. The inside bed is soft and fluffy and can be thrown in the wash. Didn’t notice any off gassing.
customer_reviews.author: M. L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats 12 pounds and under
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh!! My cat is so picky. I buy him things he doesn’t use and he LOVES this. I’m so happy. He looks around my tiny apartment for a good hiding spot and I put this in the closet and he fits perfect. The product is not good for large cats but he’s about 10 pounds and I’m so happy I can make him happy :)) I would buy this again if I could :)
customer_reviews.author: Haley Tenute

customer_reviews.title: CAT LOVED IT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson's cat but before I could put it in the room with the cat another cat got in it and has been there ever since except for eating and potty stops. I immediately ordered another one for my grandson's cat. It seems to be sturdy and my weird cat thinks it is cozy and great. The next one will be opened in my grandson's room so his cat can get it and not one of the other cats.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Tilford

customer_reviews.title: A-pur-rooved!
customer_reviews.text: The 4 sides are very sturdy (I don't know that sturdy is the right word, but for fabric and padding it holds its shape well)...the bottom is just a thin material, and my cat likes to claw it....I'm waiting for it to have holes in the bottom piece. The pillow is extremely soft and comfortable. Note of advice, don't put cat nip on it....it's hard to get it off of it.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great Hideout!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this bed! He never touched any beds that I bought in the past! Overall, this is a good hideout that I think all cats should have one available. They like small spaces to craw into! Keep in mind all beds need time for the animal to get used to it!
customer_reviews.author: Helpful Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it after we took out the cushion
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure our cat would like it. He only sometimes likes tents, but when he does use it, he always curls up and looks happy. We had to take out the fluffy pillow, because our cat is strange and doesn't like squishy surfaces, but set on carpet, it works just as well. The top isn't quite as stable as I'd like, but it doesn't fall onto the cat like a lot of them do, and its shaped in such a way that it doesn't encourage him to sit on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla Davis

customer_reviews.title: Kitty couldn't wait to get inside!
customer_reviews.text: The white pillow (inside) is nice and soft and comes out for laundering in a machine. The outside can only be handwashed. The white inside pillow was actually too lofty -- making it difficult for our cat to get inside the tent. We replaced it with a folded bath towel and now she loves it! She didn't need to get used to it but just climbed inside and napped!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cat house
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! I have a 19.5 year old Siamese back in Hungary. I purchased this house for her and mailed it back. She loves it! Looks wonderful in my parents home. We placed it next to the fireplace, she wont ever leave. Beautiful cat house, easy 5 star!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. A big hit in our home.
customer_reviews.text: Within 10 minutes of opening the packaging, each of our two cats were curled up in their own cat beds, which we call cat condos. One of our cats even moved some of her favorite toys into hers. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Your cat will LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: Not even five minutes out of the box and my little Tabata made it her new favorite place. The structure is sturdy, so it won't cave in like other more expensive cat caves. The Pillow it comes with is a very soft fleece that my cat loves to snuggle up against. And to top it off the color matches my aqua blue sofa perfectly, so it's not an eyesore. I am VERY satisfied with this purchase and would fully recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my fat cat
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our fat, paranoid cat who likes to be enclosed. She won't use it. I think it is just too small an opening for her 15lb. bulk. But our other cat (8lbs) loves it. Haven't tried to clean it yet and really should do that soon.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Tea

customer_reviews.title: Sure is pretty.
customer_reviews.text: She got in it! Almost won’t come out now. It sits on a heating pad and she loves it. I’m concerned as frigid winter arrives that without a “door”, she’ll freeze. But, I’ve moved her cat carrier to the garage for the bitterest of nights. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Great cat cave your cats will love it 😀😜
customer_reviews.text: Well built cats love it one big one small they adore kitty cave glad I bought this much sturdier than other brands get one your cat will be glad you did buy the bigger one 19 by 19
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Soft
customer_reviews.text: Like this cat tent, the cat love it. It was on time, packed correctly. Had no issues so, I didn’t talk with company so, I’ve had no reason to contact them. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: My cat took to her new bed very quickly! It seems to be a winner !!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Nixon

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my little 8 lb 12 y/o cat. He loves it! Every now & then my older 22 lb cat curls up in there & snores for hours. The boys have really enjoyed this sleeping tent.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie A

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, pad came with 3inch tear.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, but the white pad that goes inside has a 3inch tear. The tear looks like a tag was originally in this location, but then ripped off. I can obviously take a needle and thread to it, but given I bought this 'new' it would be kinda cool if the tear wasn't present.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck-the-Truck

customer_reviews.title: simulates a dog's nature to feel safe in a den
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it and I like that I can turn it around so that the a/c or sun is not aimed directly at my puppy. You have to have a small dog, however. It is like a soft little "dog house".
customer_reviews.author: I wanna tell you

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and perfect design for my fur baby!
customer_reviews.text: My long haired chihuahua loves her new bed! Every now and then she likes to have that ‘cave’ environment to hide out in and get some good sleep. Well, this bed is perfect for that! Good quality and perfect design for my fur baby!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Ahl

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Approved
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for 16 year old cat and she was inside this within 5 minutes!! Loves it! Makes her feel so secure! Great quality for the outside. The inside pillow could be a little bit better but, the kitty loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy K

customer_reviews.title: Kitty liked it right away..
customer_reviews.text: Love it, loves it.. keep it in family room off kitchen.. she likes being close to her people.. but the cozy fit keeps her warm & dampens the noise going on around her..
customer_reviews.author: Greeneyes

customer_reviews.title: My cat has no taste for good design.
customer_reviews.text: It’s adorable and I love how it looks, but my cat refuses to use it because she’s kind of a jerk. She prefers the stupid flat one I got at Five Below because she clearly has no taste.
customer_reviews.author: Angie H.

customer_reviews.title: A Big Hit with Kitty
customer_reviews.text: My small cat loves her tent! It's become a preferred place to relax and nap. The wide door lets her keep an eye on everything, too. Best cheap purchase ever!
customer_reviews.author: glitchey

customer_reviews.title: Good for dogs under 10lbs
customer_reviews.text: This little tent bed is perfect for my 9 Pound Yorkie mix. It protects him from the cold air from our fan that we have to run at night. He seems to really like it and it is very soft and the removable pillow should be easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: ksraber

customer_reviews.title: Purrrfect Cat Retreat
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality cat bed/tent. My cat loves it and I like that it is attractive in my living room. It is very sturdy and the pillow that comes with it is very plush. A win all around!
customer_reviews.author: Patty C

customer_reviews.title: Great for colder weather housing.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our adult cat. Great for use in colder weather. A little too warm when the weather warms up. But our cat loves it otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: CGYjr

customer_reviews.title: Took it out of the box and both cats went straight into it!
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't leave for another hour. Then we could move it to the floor! So yea, I'm not actually the one reviewing this; my two cats did and love it! I'm just typing for them :-P
customer_reviews.author: John T Hill IV

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I do wish the cushion wasn't white but my cat loves it. Will be ordering another one for the second floor of our home (disabled cat)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, looks great, sturdy, appropriate textiles; there is nothing I don't like about it. Delivered less than 24 hours ago and my kitty gave it a quick inspection. If she doesn't use it I'm moving in!
customer_reviews.author: Skycatcher

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: Both of my cats love this. Even the big 20-pounder manages to stuff himself inside, although it rolled over backwards one time. 😸
customer_reviews.author: Alpha Traveler

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: My kitty is mostly outside due to issues with peeing outside the litter box. He has a heated house but when the neighbor's cat started using it I got this for him. I keep it on our covered back porch and he uses it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa F

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Cat had zero interest. I liked the idea of it being able to convert into an open bed, but it looks very sloppy and is on the small side.
customer_reviews.author: Maris

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mini Australian Sheppard and it was too small. So unfortunately it seemed bigger online then when I got it in person.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this! Took her a few days and i think she was a bit afraid of the pillow. Once i removed they pillow she went right in so i just put a flatter puffy blanket inside. She’s naps in it all day
customer_reviews.author: Maura Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: No go for any of my cats! It’s a great littke home!
customer_reviews.text: Great little house I have yet to get any of my five cats to enjoy this luxury home. My Chihuahua tho seems to like it occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Diann

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: This is nice and sturdy and my little chihuahua likes it but it’s much smaller than I thought it would be. Since my dog loves being in it I’m keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: busyactonmom

customer_reviews.title: It's a bit small, but the cat certainly likes it.
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty decent, and most importantly the cat got right into it on first sight. It is rather small, but the cat doesn't seem to mind.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and roomy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 ferrets,they absolutely love it! It's soft and warm and perfect for my 2 boys.I am very satisfied with my purchase. It's plenty roomy for them and they took to it right away,they are both sound asleep in it right now beside my bed as I type this 😍
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: It's the Cat's meow
customer_reviews.text: It was just delivered today. My cat got right in and layed down like it was her birth right. This is very plush inside, she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Thyme2spend

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my outside cat warm
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cat bed for my outside cat (she refuses to come into the house). I have her food and water bowls in the garage and this cat bed. She used it the 1st night. She is safe in the garage overnight and has this bed for warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia D. Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fluffy!
customer_reviews.text: This bed tent is perfect! It is so fluffy and my cat is always in it. I had previously bought her so many other beds and she never cared for them so I wanted to try this out and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: isra

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cat bed!
customer_reviews.text: It’s very well made. The cat can sleep inside or on top of the cover and it is very soft! Another good thing is that the cushion is removable made it very easy to wash. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Z G

customer_reviews.title: One cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats uses it all the time as a sort of den. The other 3 couldn't care less about the other one I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: He basically lives in it now...only crawling out for affection or food and the occasional trip to the litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah C Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: Very soft cushion. My cat got in the first time and sat there and purred! Loves it:) I know you gave dimensions, but it sure looks small!
customer_reviews.author: donna h

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this cat dome. Very well made and very sturdy. It is alot bigger than I expected which I am very happy about. The fluffy pad that goes inside is very soft. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: me2389

customer_reviews.title: Large cat owners, check measurements
customer_reviews.text: This bed is good quality, I just wish there were larger sizes available because my big kitty can't fit more than his front half in it.
customer_reviews.author: Clockwork Calamity

customer_reviews.title: Kitty cat approved!
customer_reviews.text: Both my cats haven’t left their tent bed, since the day amazon dropped it off. I hear the purrs and kneading of my baby girl, who is very much happy with my purchase. My little boy cat still doesn’t understand it, but likes to sniff the pillow in it.
customer_reviews.author: Mirei Taylor Taniguchi

product_meta.title: Bedsure Pet Tent Cave Bed for Cats/Small Dogs - 15x15x15 inches 2-in-1 Cat Tent/Kitten Bed/Cat Hut with Removable Washable Cushioned Pillow - Microfiber Indoor Outdoor Pet Beds
product_meta.description: Size:S(15"x15"x15")| Color:Dark GreyPet Bed Solid Cat Tent Dark Grey S
feature_bullets: VERSATILE PET TENT: Versatile Bedsure Pet Tent Bed is the ultimate retreat that you can set up at home (living room, porch, balcony) or take along with you on trips, cookouts, picnics and anywhere else - 15"L x 15"W x 15"H pet bed is suitable for cats, small dogs (such as Chihuahuas, pugs, Shih Tzu) and other pets like rats or rabbits up to 11 lbs.

STURDY CONSTRUCTION: Constructed of high density foam and 100% microfiber outer material, this tent bed gives pets a cozy place to snuggle up in - The soft cushion (microfiber fill) is placed inside of the bed and can be removed for easy maintenance or be used separately anywhere - Well-made cat tents stay stable on floors and won’t collapse on itself.

SMART BED DESIGN: With a triangular entrance and cave-like design, 2-in-1 enclosed pet bed functions like a soft cat/dog house and the top folds down to provide a bed for your beloved kitty or puppy - Igloo-like structure turns this bed into the perfect hideaway and a quiet, private place to sleep - Leather handle on top makes it easy to move when needed.

PERFECT FOR YOUR KITTEN: 15"x15"x15" tent bed has plenty of room for your kitty to spread out in and is lightweight enough to move around as you or your cat wishes - Anti-slip bottom keeps pet bed in place while your kitten wriggles - Cat tent bed is fold-able for easy storage and easy to carry on the go - Stylish cave bed goes with any home decor scheme.
EASY TO CLEAN: Machine wash the inner cushion seperately in cold water only. Delicate Cycle. Do not bleach. reshape as needed. Do not machine wash or dry the foam bed. Air dry the cushion.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
